Sequence Information.Source: AI predicted, bacteria; bacteriocin, prokaryotes, plant-attached rumen microbiome; plant microbiota

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the unmodified sequence of this peptide shows 37.5% similarity tomBjAMP1. Active against bacteria S. aureus(MIC 32-128 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae (MIC 32-64 ug/ml), A. baumannii and 14 clinical strains (MIC 8-128 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (16-128 ug/ml), C. jejuni (64-256 ug/ml), E. coli K12 (MIC 64 ug/ml), S. typhimurium (MIC 64 ug/ml), E. faecalis (MIC 64 ug/ml) and L. monocytogenes (MIC 32 ug/ml). Also inhibited biofilm formation:bacteria and disrupted to some extent 48-h preformed biofilms.Antimicrobial robustness: NaCl-insensitive:A. baumannii (150 mM), CaCl2-sensitive:A. baumannii (2.5 mM), MgCl2-sensitive:A. baumannii (1 mM), KCl-sensitive:A. baumannii (4.5 mM),  NH4Cl-sensitive:A. baumannii (6 uM), ZnCl2-sensitive:A. baumannii (8 uM), and FeCl3-sensitive:A. baumannii (4 uM).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in 30 mM SDS (Alexander et al., 2024).MOA:bacteria:A. baumannii DSM 30007:: at 4xMIC showed a strong membrane permeation.Resistance development:yes:bacteria:A. baumannii DSM 30007: A. baumannii DSM 30007 developed minor resistance to this peptide in a 28 multiple passage experiment (MIC increased 4 fold).In vitro toxicity: it showed poor cytotoxicity to multiple cell lines (CC50 >589 ug/ml), including RBC (HC50 709 ug/ml).In vivo toxicity:Galleria mellonella: didn't appear to be toxic to Galleria mellonella (90% survied at 8xMIC).Synergy:antibiotics:    Showed synergistic effect with gentamicin (FIC 0.25).Updated 7/2021; 10/2024
Literature Information.Author: Oyama LB, Girdwood SE, Cookson AR, Fernandez-Fuentes N, Priv√© F, Vallin HE, Wilkinson TJ, Golyshin PN, Golyshina OV, Mikut R, Hilpert K, Richards J, Wootton M, Edwards JE, Maresca M, Perrier J, Lundy FT, Luo Y, Zhou M, Hess M, Mantovani HC, Creevey CJ, Huws SA.2017
Literature Information.Title: The rumen microbiome: an underexplored resource for novel antimicrobial discovery
